We believe that monster you fought with Priest Cain is one of the agents searching for the document, though many questions still remain. Is it working alone? What does it intend on doing with the contract once it has it? [Quest _194_SevenSignsMammonsContract sirgustavathebaldt_q194_2d.htm|"No doubt these questions will be answered in time."]
